mdRecord.dcterms:description: Founded in 1881, Yankton College was the first institution of higher learning in the Dakota Territory. It closed in December 1984, and its campus became the site of Federal Prison Camp, Yankton which opened four years later. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yankton_College [work]
